The phoenix bot lifted himself above most of the shots, but some still
hit, although they were only surface shots. He sent a rain of small
light beams down on the Predacon, but also a pair of explosive feather
shards aimed straight at his wings.

*****************************

OOC: Bots affected by Dread's ability should feel a deep fear and act
either totally frenzied or unable to move. I'd still like to know if
my co-council members feel this is an acceptable power or not, though.
I'll reply after they give me their opinion.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras:
> 
> "It would be apleasure" replied hydras who shot 25 times against 
> Tylrael
>

> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Tyrael grabs a feather shard and readies himself for the Wolf bot.
> > Unless he can fly, Wolfenstein would impale himself on it.
> > 
> > A laser bolt misses him but not by much. He surrounds himself in a

> > then replies with a massive blast of his own that would have shaken
> > even Fortress Maximus.

> > Tyrael: Out of my way, lackeys! You have not proved yourselves 
> worthy
> > of my skills. I will fight no one else than your leader today!

> turned her
> > > head and saw Perceptor... Pathetic fool, she thought. Then, she

> down,
> > > but mostly the feeling of despair that comes before death.
> > > 
> > > She closed in and readied her talons...
> > > 
> > > Tyrael, though, shot once at Maxima then went for Hydras at a 
> stunning
> > > speed. He did not seem like it, but he matched his enemy on all
